Title: Services are not removed on uninstall _ Community
Author: Christian Hauggaard
Text: Sometimes the TimeXtender Scheduler service is not removed from the services list when TimeXtender is uninstalled Remove the service manually. This can be done using the command prompt as follows:

Lists.heading: Resolution
paragraphs: Remove the service manually. This can be done using the command prompt as follows:
list: Run command prompt with elevated rights: Click Start Type "CMD" Right click the icon and click Run as administrator
Right click the icon and click Run as administrator
Type "sc delete 'timeXtender Scheduler <Version>'" in the prompt and press enter.
